Posts.Content: Apr 1, 2010 03:09PM MrSnuffleupagus wrote: hello, i just joined from england.  i've had lung mets since 2002 - still smoking and not exercising ; p  just started new chemo today (capecitabine & lapatinib) have done herceptin, taxotere, taxol & avastin in the past, & radiation, plus the usual entry-level slash, poison & burn
Posts.Title: Looking for my "Lung Mets" sisters.... WingsofHope grammadebbie
